short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extract subtitles from YouTube videos. Select, copy, and even translate the words using the Google Translate extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension helps users extract subtitles from YouTube videos and provides options to select, copy, and even translate the words using the Google Translate extension. 
Unlock the power of subtitles with our YouTube Subtitle Extractor! 
Seamlessly select, copy, and translate words with ease. Say goodbye to language barriers and dive deeper into the world of videos!"
